ComicInfo.Title: Rhino What You Did Last Summer
ComicInfo.Writer: Eric A. Anderson,Manny Trembley,Eric Anderson,Eric Anderson,Manny Trembley
ComicInfo.Summary: Rhino What You Did Last Summer: Sam and Grog tackle the jungle girl and her pet rhino. After the rhino makes its final charge and the jungle girl gets away, Grog tells Sam his long and exciting history on the high seas. Sam and Grog track the jungle girl to a lonely graveyard where they are both knocked out by a witch doctor's magic powder.
